function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of rigorous study on the energy conservation and maintenance cost savings from UVGI lamps in AHUs.","Impact":"Unverified claims may lead to inefficient use of resources and maintenance costs.","Mitigation":"Conducting a more rigorous study to verify the energy conservation and maintenance cost savings claims.","Technologies":"Data collection technology, energy monitoring systems.","People":"Maintenance and facility managers, energy conservation stakeholders.","Owner":"Facility management, energy conservation stakeholders."},{"Description":"Unfounded claims of reduced health care-associated infections (HAIs) from AHU-installed UVGI.","Impact":"Potential increased risk of HAIs if UVGI's effectiveness is overestimated.","Mitigation":"Conducting scientific studies to validate claims and promote evidence-based practices.","Technologies":"Biological sampling equipment, peer-reviewed scientific research.","People":"Healthcare facilities, infection control personnel, building managers.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, research institutions."},{"Description":"Localized effectiveness of UV-C lamps in AHUs may not impact overall air quality and contamination.","Impact":"Limited effectiveness in reducing fungal spores and insufficient impact on overall air quality.","Mitigation":"Evaluation of UVGI effectiveness in different areas of the HVAC system and regular inspection of air quality.","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, UV-C radiation measurement devices.","People":"Facility managers, air quality inspectors, HVAC maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Facility management, air quality inspection services."}]}
